import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { incProductCount, decProductCount, removeProduct } from '../actions/cartActions' import Layout from '../components/Layout' function Panier() { let productsInCart = useSelector(state => state.cart.products) let dispatch = useDispatch() return (

Your Cart

{ product.count > 1 && ( ) }

) } export default Panier
